sn10.2:1: Ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā rājagahe vihārati gijjhakūṭe pabbate. Atha kho sakkanāmako yakkho yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn10.2:3: "Yena kenaci vaṇṇena,saṁvāso sakka jāyati;Na taṁ arahati sappañño,manasā anukampituṁ.
sn10.2:4: Manasā ce pasannena,yadaññamanusāsati;Na tena hoti saṁyutto,yānukampā anuddayā"ti.
